lead_paragraph: MAYER--Willa-Ann, age 77. (April 29, 1938-January 19, 2016). Born in the Bronx to Harry and Sylvia Greenhouse and survived by her beloved husband John and heartbroken daughter Jonill. Willa's art degree from Pratt led to a career in fashion, where she dressed stars/friends like Nina Simone and commissioned shoe drawings from Andy Warhol. A dancer, artist, publicist, world-traveler, and teacher for 20 years with a Masters degree from NYU, Willa lived many lives. Cute as a button at under 95 pounds, she impressed all who met her and will be forever missed. Willa-Ann will be celebrated Thursday, January 21, 2016 at 11:30am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
